message.body: there was a question about ugly betty at trivia tonight... so you can take back all the times you made fun of me for it.
hahah.
i hope you got it right
i did!
waiting at verizon to get my new phone...
which one? did dad tell you about the offer he made me?
S4. what offer? He and I discussed a possible option.
buying my s3 so i can buy the s4
I thought you might like that idea.
i do! it just depends on how much i actually get to work after this.
That makes sense.
Trivia team name of the week... The Diarrhea of Ann Frank (they didn't win)
that's hilarious!
we played as "meat wagon" yesterday
Sounds like the name of a team that knows their 'Ugly Betty' trivia.
exactly. i also answered a question about the invasion of panama because they talked about it on weeds. and i impressed andrew by knowing what the genus lepidopterae (sp?) covers.
Umm...is that butterflies?
and moths, yeah. why that's so impressive, i'm not sure.
idk either. Maybe we are just smart.:-)
that's my thought! being smart is exhausting, though. goodnighttt!
BTW who thought putting the screenwake button directly opposite the volume control was a good idea?
i'm sure you'll get used to it, haha. it doesn't bother me.
Goodnight, punkin. ily.
ily2!
how do you like the new phone?
It's good, but I still have a lot to get used to. And I have to put my music on this one. =-O
how much did you end up paying with the upgrade?

The phone is 249, but with a 50 dollar rebate form to fill out. Plus the 30 dollar contract fee and accessories, if you get any. (Aftermarket is much less expensive but I went ahead and got an otterbox because I am paranoid now)
I think if you buy online, they just skip the rebate and charge 199, which I think is not nice.
you can still get the upgrade price if you buy online? and then 30 upgrade fee and whatever accessories?
(and what color is the otter box?)
Yes. But what you and dad are doing is more complex because he is adding data, so you might need to go in. And the box is white shell with grey trim/rubber.
Also, my notification tone is now birds chirping.
perfect for receiving twitters!
ha. yep.
dad totally has new phone fever. hahaha.
Oh, really...How can you tell?
Yep, sounds like he's infected.
he was bound to catch it at some point or another.
Luckily he is willing to make a deal on a cure that works for you, too!
hopefully! i do love this phone, though, haha. so hopefully i will love it's brother (cousin? son? how are phones related?) just as much.
You can test mine first, to make sure.
i'm mostly interested in the battery life! so you'll have to let me know how it's going when you get a better idea.
Ratings in online reviews were very good...google it!
i have, don't worry. :)
